output: pdf_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

## Example

```{r example, echo=FALSE}
devtools::load_all()
r <- potteR::get_summary(data)

t <- purrr::map2(
  r, names(r), 
  function(x, y){
    knitr::kable(x, caption = paste(y))
    }
  )
print(r)
```
